ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] That wurm guy in BW...
ygData.msgSnippet: it is currently bugged.  Nezekezena is the wurm, he spawns around the 4 pillar structure near the crater and roams between there and the FM zone. unfortunately
ygData.messageBody:
it is currently bugged. Nezekezena is the wurm, he spawns around the 4
pillar structure near the crater and roams between there and the FM zone.
unfortunately he is dropping nothing at this time, he is supposed to drop
wurm guts for bards and burning embers for mages. there is a wurm named a
Sarnak Extremist that is dropping the guts instead. he is a wurm instead of
a sarnak. we killed about 10 of each yesterday and got no embers so who
knows it may still be screwed, or maybe the embers are super rare.

Shada, 57.9, not 57 forever as previously announced :)
Afterlife

> Mage friend of mine apparently needs a rare drop off this
> fellow... who is
> also used for the bard quest as I understand it. Anyone know
> its spawn
> time/ path or a website I can get it off of?
>
> Halana, 57th forever Shaman with new uber - spear (yay)
> Tani, 38th bardette
> Solusek Ro
